member.name: F:Fake.ILMergeHelper.ILMergeParams.XmlDocs
member.summary: True -> XML documentation files are merged to produce an XML documentation file for the target assembly.

member.name: F:Fake.ILMergeHelper.ILMergeParams.UnionMerge
member.summary: True -> types with the same name are all merged into a single type in the target assembly.

member.name: F:Fake.ILMergeHelper.ILMergeParams.TargetPlatform
member.summary: v1 or v1.1 or v2 or v4 or version,platform

member.name: F:Fake.ILMergeHelper.ILMergeParams.SearchDirectories
member.summary: Directories to be used to search for input assemblies

member.name: F:Fake.ILMergeHelper.ILMergeParams.DebugInfo
member.summary: True (default) -> creates a .pdb file for the output assembly and merges into it any .pdb files found for input assemblies.

member.name: F:Fake.ILMergeHelper.ILMergeParams.Closed
member.summary: True -> transitive closure of the input assemblies is computed and added to the list of input assemblies.

member.name: F:Fake.ILMergeHelper.ILMergeParams.AttributeFile
member.summary: Path to an assembly that will be used to get all of the assembly-level attributes

member.name: F:Fake.ILMergeHelper.ILMergeParams.AllowWildcards
member.summary: Wild cards in file names are expanded and all matching files will be used as input.

member.name: F:Fake.ILMergeHelper.ILMergeParams.AllowMultipleAssemblyLevelAttributes
member.summary: Assembly-level attributes names that have the same type are copied over into the target directory

member.name: F:Fake.ILMergeHelper.ILMergeParams.AllowDuplicateTypes
member.summary: Duplicate types policy
